name: Roller Madness (EmeraldStreak)
description:
Roll around and collect the coins as quickly as you can, but avoid the enemy boxes and the glowing red floor! There are two levels to complete.

Controls

Gamepad: Use the Control Stick to move around!

Keyboard: Use the arrow or WASD keys to move around!

Using a gamepad makes this much easier to control!

Info

This is an older class project I made for Michigan State University's "Introduction to Game Development" online course (offered via Coursera). The basic features of the game were developed using assets and instructions provided by the course. I designed and developed additional features and the entire second level.
